document_data.name: Asmrae Barelder
document_data.mainbody: '''Lady Asmrae Barelder''' was the wife of Lord [[Montror Barelder]], head of the [[Barelder]] family in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Asmrae was a stoic and careful woman with great self-control and patience, widely regarded as an "ice queen" for her silent and calculating demeanour.
document_data.Relationships: Asmrae loved her husband dearly and assisted him in all matters, taking care of the administration and finances of their holdings. She raised her eldest [[Narnathra Barelder|Narnathra]] to be a wise and responsible ruler following her father.
document_data.History: After her husband was slain in [[1479 DR]], Asmrae was heartbroken and followed him into the afterlife in [[1482 DR]].
